title: PURITY | Innovative Daily Detox Supplements - Clinique La Prairie
description: Shop PURITY supplement, your ally to support the natural cleansing processes of your body when you plan a period of intense detox. Order online.
cleaned_text: Holistic Complex with exclusive fusion of 5 bioactive compounds: integrated in a higher concentration to support enhanced antioxidant effects. FOUNDATION INGREDIENTS Chlorella vulgaris, Grape seed extract (GSE), Dandelion Extract and Aronia Berry Extract are the powerful assets paired with other 6 plant-based and essential nutrients in this detox formula. Discover more about the benefits of some high-powered ingredients: Chlorella vulgaris - Nutritionally rich green protein content, antioxidant pigments, essential fatty acids and -glucans. Acting as a natural selective chelator, therefore useful in the detoxification process. Grape seed extract (GSE) - Rich in and oligomeric proanthocyanin complexes (OPCs). Dandelion Extract - Known to help support digestive system and liver function. Aronia Berry Extract - One of the richest sources of plant antioxidants and a great source of fiber, Vitamin C and manganese. Contact us for more
